cards.name: Adapt New Strategies
cards.text: Own 2 faction technologies.

cards.name: Become the Gatekeeper
cards.text: Have 1 or more ships in a system that contains an alpha wormhole and 1 or more ships in a system that contains a beta wormhole.

cards.name: Control the Region
cards.text: Have 1 or more ships in 6 systems.

cards.name: Cut Supply Lines
cards.text: Have 1 or more ships in the same system as another player's space dock.

cards.name: Destroy Their Greatest Ship
cards.text: Destroy another player's war sun or flagship.

cards.name: Establish a Perimeter
cards.text: Have 4 PDS units on the game board.

cards.name: Forge an Alliance
cards.text: Control 4 cultural planets.

cards.name: Form a Spy Network
cards.text: Discard 5 action cards.

cards.name: Fuel the War Machine
cards.text: Have 3 space docks on the game board.

cards.name: Gather a Mighty Fleet
cards.text: Have 5 dreadnaughts on the game board.

cards.name: Learn Secrets of the Cosmos
cards.text: Have 1 or more ships in 3 systems that are each adjacent to an anomaly.

cards.name: Make an Example of Their World
cards.text: Use BOMBARDMENT to destroy the last of a player's ground forces on a planet.

cards.name: Master the Laws of Physics
cards.text: Own 4 technologies of the same color.

cards.name: Mine Rare Metals
cards.text: Control 4 hazardous planets.

cards.name: Monopolize Production
cards.text: Control 4 industrial planets.

cards.name: Occupy the Seat of the Empire
cards.text: Control Mecatol Rex and have 3 or more ships in its system.

cards.name: Spark a Rebellion
cards.text: Win a combat againt a player who has the most victory points.

cards.name: Threaten Enemies
cards.text: Have 1 or more ships in a system that is adjacent to another player's home system.

cards.name: Turn Their Fleets to Dust
cards.text: Use SPACE CANNON to destroy the last of a player's ships in a system.

cards.name: Unveil Flagship
cards.text:
Win a space combat in a system that contains your flagship.
You cannot score this objective if your flagship is destroyed in the combat.
